text: Wayne Mitchell was a Southern Gospel singer for The King's Servants and sang with The Kingdom Heirs from (1981–1987). He is now the pilot of a Bonanza G-35 and is involved in the development of an airpark in Blaine, Tennessee called Landing at River’s Edge. Landing at River’s Edge is a gated residential airpark community featuring a 3000' runway, golf course and river frontage. ==References== Category:American gospel singers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Wayne Mitchell (singer)
